attributes.action: Support PVI Nurseries to prevent closures
attributes.additional_details: The rising costs in staff wages, rent, food, utility bills etc etc etc and then being told you can’t charge what you need to survive (as a private business) is hideous, almost like they don’t want us to survive! Yes help parents but not at the expense of others! This is not only having a financial impact but an impact on all those working in early years mental health as the pressures continue to rise
attributes.background: Stop telling private businesses how to offer funding and what they can and cannot charge for, small businesses are closing due to the rising costs. As a manager of an early years setting each year is becoming more challenging, and the government’s proposals and guidance is having a massive impact.!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you could consider signing this petition which similarly calls for increased funding: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701693.

If you're concerned about yourself or a loved one, find out how you can get help from a mental health charity or organisation: https://www.nhs.uk/nhs-services/mental-health-services/.
